name: P4R3NTing 101
description:
It is the Year 20XX and chaos has broken out abord the colonialization ship 'Final Solution 2'.

The Incubation-Control for the ships infant passengers is malfunctioning and they are waking up from their sleep way too early.

Luckily the ship is able to fix this error, but it will take some time during which the newborns need tending.

This is where you come into play!

You are a caretaker robot model 'p4r3-nt' and it is your job to feed, clean and put the newborns to bed.

Good Luck!

----------------------------------

This game was made in under 48 hours for the 46th Ludum Dare Gamejam.

-----------------------------------

Credits:

A game by @AndideBob

With music by @DJBBone
